backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing publication state, subdomain, and custom domain with functions to publish, unpublish, configure domain, and reset storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a domain change to jpdigitalmarketing.in and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including provisioning page, status panel, layout, validation, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, title, fonts, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring QueryClientProvider, layout, provisioning page, and global Toaster.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, footer with attribution, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/ProvisioningStat: UI panel showing provisioning state with icons, status text, and displayed primary or preview URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend interactions including publish, unpublish, domain/subdomain retrieval, and reset operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes, including sidebar and chart palettes.
frontend/src/lib/subdomainValidation.ts: Provides subdomain validation logic enforcing DNS rules and reserved-name checks, plus a normalization helper.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/SubdomainProvisioning: Implements the UI and logic for validating, setting, publishing, unpublishing, and configuring subdomains and custom domains.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, fonts, container settings, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requested features, known issues, and current state for the JP Digital Marketing website setup.
